text: Ezio Auditore da Firenze is a playable character of the Assassin's Creed franchise. He is voiced by Roger Craig Smith. He is an ancestor to both Desmond Miles and Clay Kaczmarek. ==Biography== Ezio Auditore was born at Florence in June 4th, 1459. As a young adult, he became an assassin. Category:Assassin's Creed Category:Fictional characters introduced in the 2000s Category:Fictional Italian people Category:Video game characters
title: Ezio Auditore da Firenze
